page.title: 06Royal Victoria Country Park
page.content: (Cont) The grounds are now open to the public and contain facilities for football, hockey,tennis,sailing,camping,badminto n,boule,cricket,etc.The Y.M.C.A. building which has become the{Park {Centre}is made entirely of wood and was presented by the Timber Trades Federation in 1940.Here ther is accommodation for the warden and his family, a bar/reception room,a restar- aunt toilets and a souvenier shop. The warden opens his garden on Sundays This is popular with young children because he keeps small pets. The park is often a venue for special shows and exhibitions.There has been a kite festival and a bus bonanza recently.
